content: crocheted t-rex dinosaur in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked from nose to tail with one seam pattern no me-077-bn yarn group b theme soft toys see companion tracy the triceratops here 1 **size** height approx 18 cm length approx 18 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 50 g colour 31 forest green for body 50 g colour 41 olive for legs and spines leftover black for the eyes **crochet gauge** 20 double crochets in width and 20 row in height = 10 x 10 cm **crochet hook ** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **accessories ** wadding 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s37-22-tracy-the-triceratops
